A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a mess\, even more than The Force Awakens it feels like a cliche Hollywood comedy-action-romance with Star Wars slapped on it. Doesn't follow the story from the last movie\, bad jokes\, blatant political agenda and plot holes made it thoroughly unenjoyable for me. I never felt the excitement I had for other Star Wars movies\, simply because the atmosphere was non-existent. Oh and Daisy Ridley's over the top facial acrobatics\, it looks horrible and reflect badly on her as an actress.
